newsitem.title: CANADA: Potash Corp sets Arcadian debt tender price.
newsitem.headline: Potash Corp sets Arcadian debt tender price.

text.p: Potash Corp of Saskatchewan Inc said on Wednesday the tender price for each US$1,000 principal amount of Arcadian Partners Lp and Arcadian Finance Corp 10.75 percent senior notes was set at US$1,137.02.
Potash Corp said the amount it would pay included accrued and unpaid interest of US$37.326 and a consent amount of US$10.
The tender offer for the notes was to expire at 1700 EST/2200 GMT on March 6, Potash Corp said.
The company said earlier that Arcadian Corp shareholders approved Potash Corp's acquisition of the nitrogen-based fertilizer company.
Donaldson, Lufkin & Jenrette Securities Corp was dealer manager for the tender offer.
